OOC:: Yeah. I have a lot of posts to catch up on.  That's what 
happens when you get behind on them.  But thanks for working with me 
on this. 

KitKat3::
She jumped off and looked at Blaze. "I'm not worried about biting off 
more than I can chew.  But I just want to make sure he won't injure 
or hurt the others in the pack.  But, with his wild side, he may be a 
bigger asset than originally thought.  Let's get him to a CR so he 
can recover fully."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Sorry Logo you're about 5 posts late, by now you're leaping on the 
back of
> an unconscious bull. (Quite an impressive fight for a former 
leader.)
> 
> She jumped off  the bull's back and looked at it. "Whoah, that's one
> animal you don't want to tick off."  SHe transformed into bot mode
> and looked at Blaze. "How can we get that thing..er, him fixed up?"
> 
> Ok this I can work with.
> 
> Blaze looked up and saw Kit Kat3, she'd shown up late but in a way 
she was
> lucky she did. "When Bullet gets angry he loses control of his 
technical
> functions and goes wild. Consider yourself lucky that he's mellowed 
a lot
> since coming to this planet." She wanted to side with Bullet under 
the
> circumstances but she couldn't bring herself to side against the 
majority.
